verse:
संयुक्तमेतत् क्षरमक्षरं च व्यक्ताव्यक्तं भरते विश्वमीशः।
अनीशश्चात्मा बध्यते भोक्तृभावाज्ज्ञात्वा देवं मुच्यते सर्वपाशैः॥

terms.भोक्तृभावात्: by the notion of being the enjoyer,

meaning: The Lord of the universe, who is both the perishable and the imperishable, the manifest and the unmanifest, resides within the body, combining and merging everything. On the other hand, the individual soul, being the controller, becomes bound by the notion of being the enjoyer. However, by knowing and realizing the Divine, the soul becomes liberated from all forms of bondage.
